content: show your support and spread hope with the kick cancer doll crochet pattern this heartfelt beginner-friendly pattern lets you create an adorable customizable doll designed to inspire strength and courage perfect as a gift for loved ones fighting cancer fundraising events or to raise awareness this doll is a symbol of resilience wrapped in handmade charm download includes 4 variations of dolls each with their own accessory * kane warrior wears blue and red and has a removable chemo hat * kylie graceful wears turquoise and pink and wears a removable wig * koa brave one wears green and yellow and wears a removable face mask * kindra greatest champion wears fuchsia and purple and has a removable crown features skill level easy to intermediate instructions are written in english using u s crochet terms customizable change colors to represent different cancer awareness ribbons detailed instructions step-by-step guides for all 4 variations and 4 accessories finished size each doll is approximately 7 wide by 11 5 tall depending on yarn and hook used materials needed cotton worsted weight yarn crochet hook size g 4 0 mm fiberfill stuffing safety eyes or embroidery thread for facial features craft a doll filled with hope love and the spirit to kick cancer to the curb
